summary: This is an email from an unidentified sender to an unidentified recipient, dated May 23, 2019, requesting a final review of two attached memos concerning the SDNY's handling of cases, with specific attention to the Epstein case. The email suggests the recipient had not previously seen the Epstein-related material.

events.title: Final Review Request for SDNY Memos
events.description: An email is sent requesting a final careful look at two memos from the SDNY, with specific attention to the Epstein case, as the recipient had not seen that material before.

keyFacts: An email dated May 23, 2019, requests a final review of SDNY memos concerning case handling.
The request specifically highlights the Epstein case for attention, noting the recipient had not seen that material previously.
Two attachments are referenced: 'SDNY Memo_to_DAG_- GSB_Recused.5.22.19v2.docx' and 'SDNY_Memo_to_AG.GSB.cases.5.23.19.v3.doex'.
